stages.logText: I met a few guards from Stoutford on sentry outside a fortress called Flagstone. Their leader told me that Flagstone was built a few hundred of years ago and served as a prison for house Gorland of Stoutford. When Lord Emeric of Stoutford was slain during the Noble Wars, it was fogotten soon after. Recently, undeads started  pouring out of  Flagstone. I should investigate the source of the undead monsters. The guard tells me to return to him if I need help.
I found a dug out tunnel beneath Flagstone, that seems to lead to a larger cave. The cave is guarded by a demon that I am not even able to approach. Maybe the guard outside Flagstone knows more?
The guard tells me to look around for more the former warden. He is worried about the demon and the undead prisoners.
I found the former warden of Flagstone on the upper level. Among his remains I found a necklace with some enscriptions. I should return to the guard now.
I have learned the words required to approach the demon beneath Flagstone. 'Daylight Shadow'. It seems like the warden has something to do with the monster invasion.
Deep beneath Flagstone, I found a powerful winged demon. It seems like the warden kept on running the prison and experimented with necromancy.

I found one prisoner, Narael, alive deep beneath Flagstone. Narael was once a citizen of Nor City. He is too weak to walk by himself, but if I can find his wife in Nor City, I would be handsomely rewarded.
I approached the sentry again and he was happy to hear the source of the undead is banished. I should talk to Yolgen, the priest of Stoutford, for a reward.
Yolgen rewarded me handsomely for my efforts and is happy that there is one thing less the citizens of Stoutford have to worry about.
